title: Attack Cooldown
description: Adds a cooldown to a mob. The intention of this cooldown is to be used to prevent the mob from attempting to aquire new attack targets.

attack_cooldown_complete_event.description: Event to be run when the cooldown is complete.
attack_cooldown_complete_event.title: Attack Cooldown Complete Event

attack_cooldown_time.description: Amount of time in seconds for the cooldown. Can be specified as a number or a pair of numbers (Minimum and max).
attack_cooldown_time.title: Attack Cooldown Time
